A few people are complaining about the game crashing, but what's actually happening is you're hitting the button that's mapped to (B) on the Xbox 360 controller (this game was ported from Xbox 360). If you hit that button on your gamepad instead of the button mapped to (A), the game flickers and quits without asking...looking like it crashed. If you (A) the game continues instead of quitting.
